name: PSYCHO-PASS: Mandatory Happiness
description: In a world where psychological states can be quantified, every choice has consequences, victims can become criminals, and the very nature of truth can warp and shift. Can detectives Nadeshiko Kugatachi and Takuma Tsurugi remain on the path of justice as they face the ugly truths of humanity?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Core i3 (Haswell) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 2GB (or Intel HD Graphics 4000) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound Additional Notes: Runs best on Skylake or better processors
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Core i3 (Skylake) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 2GB (or Intel HD Graphics 4000) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound
